pullrequest.title: Support up to 5 payload machines per team

content.raw: I tried it out locally and the round was able to spin 5 payloads per team, and all machines are returning valid ssh keys. I'm not sure how to test the rest of the setup though. If you're sure it works, we can merge it. Otherwise, we could merge this into dev and you can try the whole setup before porting it to production.
content.html: I tried it out locally and the round was able to spin 5 payloads per team, and all machines are returning valid ssh keys. I'm not sure how to test the rest of the setup though. If you're sure it works, we can merge it. Otherwise, we could merge this into dev and you can try the whole setup before porting it to production.
